verses.verse: Afterward he brought<WH935> me to<WH413> the temple,<WH1964> and measured<WH4058> <WH853> the posts,<WH352> six<WH8337> cubits<WH520> broad<WH7341> on the one side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and six<WH8337> cubits<WH520> broad<WH7341> on the other side,<WH4480> <WH6311> which was the breadth<WH7341> of the tabernacle.<WH168>

And the breadth<WH7341> of the door<WH6607> was ten<WH6235> cubits;<WH520> and the sides<WH3802> of the door<WH6607> were five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> on the one side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> on the other side:<WH4480> <WH6311> and he measured<WH4058> the length<WH753> thereof, forty<WH705> cubits:<WH520> and the breadth,<WH7341> twenty<WH6242> cubits.<WH520>

Then went<WH935> he inward,<WH6441> and measured<WH4058> the post<WH352> of the door,<WH6607> two<WH8147> cubits;<WH520> and the door,<WH6607> six<WH8337> cubits;<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> of the door,<WH6607> seven<WH7651> cubits.<WH520>

So he measured<WH4058> <WH853> the length<WH753> thereof, twenty<WH6242> cubits;<WH520> and the breadth,<WH7341> twenty<WH6242> cubits,<WH520> before<WH413> <WH6440> the temple:<WH1964> and he said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, This<WH2088> is the most holy<WH6944> <WH6944> place.

After he measured<WH4058> the wall<WH7023> of the house,<WH1004> six<WH8337> cubits;<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> of every side chamber,<WH6763> four<WH702> cubits,<WH520> round about<WH5439> <WH5439> the house<WH1004> on every side.<WH5439>

And the side chambers<WH6763> were three,<WH7969> one<WH6763> over<WH413> another,<WH6763> and thirty<WH7970> in order;<WH6471> and they entered<WH935> into the wall<WH7023> which<WH834> was of the house<WH1004> for the side chambers<WH6763> round about,<WH5439> <WH5439> that they might have<WH1961> hold,<WH270> but they had<WH1961> not<WH3808> hold<WH270> in the wall<WH7023> of the house.<WH1004>

And there was an enlarging,<WH7337> and a winding about<WH5437> still upward<WH4605> <WH4605> to the side chambers:<WH6763> for<WH3588> the winding about<WH4141> of the house<WH1004> went still upward<WH4605> <WH4605> round about<WH5439> <WH5439> the house:<WH1004> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the breadth<WH7341> of the house<WH1004> was still upward,<WH4605> and so<WH3651> increased<WH5927> from the lowest<WH8481> chamber to<WH5921> the highest<WH5945> by the midst.<WH8484>

I saw<WH7200> also the height<WH1363> of the house<WH1004> round about:<WH5439> <WH5439> the foundations<WH4328> of the side chambers<WH6763> were a full<WH4393> reed<WH7070> of six<WH8337> great<WH679> cubits.<WH520>

The thickness<WH7341> of the wall,<WH7023> which<WH834> was for the side chamber<WH6763> without,<WH2351> was five<WH2568> cubits:<WH520> and that which<WH834> was left<WH5117> was the place<WH1004> of the side chambers<WH6763> that<WH834> were within.<WH1004>
And between<WH996> the chambers<WH3957> was the width<WH7341> of twenty<WH6242> cubits<WH520> round about<WH5439> the house<WH1004> on every side.<WH5439> <WH5439>

And the doors<WH6607> of the side chambers<WH6763> were toward the place that was left,<WH5117> one<WH259> door<WH6607> toward<WH1870> the north,<WH6828> and another<WH259> door<WH6607> toward the south:<WH1864> and the breadth<WH7341> of the place<WH4725> that was left<WH5117> was five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> round about.<WH5439> <WH5439>

Now the building<WH1146> that<WH834> was before<WH413> <WH6440> the separate place<WH1508> at the end<WH6285> toward<WH1870> the west<WH3220> was seventy<WH7657> cubits<WH520> broad;<WH7341> and the wall<WH7023> of the building<WH1146> was five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> thick<WH7341> round about,<WH5439> <WH5439> and the length<WH753> thereof ninety<WH8673> cubits.<WH520>

So he measured<WH4058> <WH853> the house,<WH1004> a hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> long;<WH753> and the separate place,<WH1508> and the building,<WH1140> with the walls<WH7023> thereof, a hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> long;<WH753>
Also the breadth<WH7341> of the face<WH6440> of the house,<WH1004> and of the separate place<WH1508> toward the east,<WH6921> a hundred<WH3967> cubits.<WH520>

And he measured<WH4058> the length<WH753> of the building<WH1146> over against<WH413> <WH6440> the separate place<WH1508> which<WH834> was behind<WH5921> <WH310> it, and the galleries<WH862> thereof on the one side<WH4480> <WH6311> and on the other side,<WH4480> <WH6311> a hundred<WH3967> cubits,<WH520> with the inner<WH6442> temple,<WH1964> and the porches<WH197> of the court;<WH2691>

The door posts,<WH5592> and the narrow<WH331> windows,<WH2474> and the galleries<WH862> round about<WH5439> on their three stories,<WH7969> over against<WH5048> the door,<WH5592> ceiled<WH7824> with wood<WH6086> round about,<WH5439> <WH5439> and from the ground<WH776> up to<WH5704> the windows,<WH2474> and the windows<WH2474> were covered;<WH3680>

To <WH5921> that above<WH4480> <WH5921> the door,<WH6607> even unto<WH5704> the inner<WH6442> house,<WH1004> and without,<WH2351> and by<WH413> all<WH3605> the wall<WH7023> round about<WH5439> <WH5439> within<WH6442> and without,<WH2435> by measure.<WH4060>

And it was made<WH6213> with cherubims<WH3742> and palm trees,<WH8561> so that a palm tree<WH8561> was between<WH996> a cherub<WH3742> and a cherub;<WH3742> and every cherub<WH3742> had two<WH8147> faces;<WH6440>

So that the face<WH6440> of a man<WH120> was toward<WH413> the palm tree<WH8561> on the one side,<WH4480> <WH6311> and the face<WH6440> of a young lion<WH3715> toward<WH413> the palm tree<WH8561> on the other side:<WH4480> <WH6311> it was made<WH6213> through<WH413> all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> round about.<WH5439> <WH5439>
From the ground<WH776> unto<WH5704> above<WH4480> <WH5921> the door<WH6607> were cherubims<WH3742> and palm trees<WH8561> made,<WH6213> and on the wall<WH7023> of the temple.<WH1964>
The posts<WH4201> of the temple<WH1964> were squared,<WH7251> and the face<WH6440> of the sanctuary;<WH6944> the appearance<WH4758> of the one as the appearance<WH4758> of the other.

The altar<WH4196> of wood<WH6086> was three<WH7969> cubits<WH520> high,<WH1364> and the length<WH753> thereof two<WH8147> cubits;<WH520> and the corners<WH4740> thereof, and the length<WH753> thereof, and the walls<WH7023> thereof, were of wood:<WH6086> and he said<WH1696> unto<WH413> me, This<WH2088> is the table<WH7979> that<WH834> is before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>
And the temple<WH1964> and the sanctuary<WH6944> had two<WH8147> doors.<WH1817>

And the doors<WH1817> had two<WH8147> leaves<WH1817> apiece, two<WH8147> turning<WH4142> leaves;<WH1817> two<WH8147> leaves for the one<WH259> door,<WH1817> and two<WH8147> leaves<WH1817> for the other<WH312> door.

And there were made<WH6213> on<WH413> them, on<WH413> the doors<WH1817> of the temple,<WH1964> cherubims<WH3742> and palm trees,<WH8561> like as<WH834> were made<WH6213> upon the walls;<WH7023> and there were thick<WH5645> planks<WH6086> upon<WH413> the face<WH6440> of the porch<WH197> without.<WH2351>

And there were narrow<WH331> windows<WH2474> and palm trees<WH8561> on the one side<WH4480> <WH6311> and on the other side,<WH4480> <WH6311> on<WH413> the sides<WH3802> of the porch,<WH197> and upon the side chambers<WH6763> of the house,<WH1004> and thick planks.<WH5646>
